kateacuff.comment: I would like to hear more about what was done regarding student input before I vote.

grahampaige.comment: Okay. My vote is no. And since there was some confusion about what we were voting on, I'd like to explain why I voted no. We're not really voting on whether this program exists. It does exist already. But rather we're being asked to approve an expenditure of $150,000 over three years. So I'm saying no because I don't think we can afford to do that at this time with all the other needs that we have. So thank you very much.
